title: Euler 1
text:
Bruteforcing - index by modulo.

t <- 1:999
answer <- sum(t[t %% 3 == 0 | t %% 5 == 0])

title: Euler 1
text:
Bruteforcing - index by modulo.

t <- 1:999
answer <- sum(t[t %% 3 == 0 | t %% 5 == 0])

title: Euler 2
text:
Generating the sequence using numbers. Restricting, indexing on modulo 2, and summing.

library(numbers)
t <- fibonacci(50, sequence = T)
t <- t[t < 4000000]

answer <- sum(t[t %% 2 == 0])

title: Euler 2
text:
Generating the sequence using numbers. Restricting, indexing on modulo 2, and summing.

library(numbers)
t <- fibonacci(50, sequence = T)
t <- t[t < 4000000]

answer <- sum(t[t %% 2 == 0])
